S-waiting-on-review

Managed to triage everything that's been inactive for 18 days or more:

#87052 19 days - waiting on initial review (fairly small PR, so might be quick for someone to review) - author: phlopsi, assignee: joshtriplett
#86197 18 days - has conflicts, but just in test output; pinged author and reassigned since it's been open since June 10 without a review - author: FabianWolff, new assignee: JohnTitor
#86984 18 days - waiting on review and may need libs-api FCP - author: Smittyvb, assignee: joshtriplett
#86439 June 19 - waiting on initial review - author: CDirkx, assignee: m-ou-se
#83850 May 13 - waiting on initial review; language change - author: ldm0, assignee: nikomatsakis
#86072 18 days - waiting on initial review; maybe needs to be reassigned to someone familiar with the details of cross-compilation? - author: MarcusCalhoun-Lopez, assignee: matthewjasper
#85971 June 10 - waiting on review (small diagnostics PR); reassigned to davidtwco - author: FabianWolff, new assignee: davidtwco
#85166 June 23 - waiting on review - author: mbhall88, assignee: dtolnay
#84267 June 4 - waiting on initial review - author: dtolnay, assignee: matthewjasper
#87054 18 days - waiting on review - author: kit-981, assignee: joshtriplett
